testsuite.name: feature.DetailBugs.As a user I want to add a product to my wishlist and share a product by using detail wishlist and share buttons

testcase.classname: feature.DetailBugs.As a user I want to add a product to my wishlist and share a product by using detail wishlist and share buttons
testcase.name: I go to a product detail and click Wishlist and Share buttons, I should see this product in the my wishlist and Share button has a reaction -- @1.1
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario Outline: I go to a product detail and click Wishlist and Share buttons, I should see this product in the my wishlist and Share button has a reaction -- @1.1 Given I pass on boarding ... passed in 6.840s Given I am on home page ... passed in 72.874s When I open a product detail from a random category ... passed in 3.169s When I click the button by "com.allandroidprojects.getirsample:id/layout_action1" ... passed in 1.210s Then The "com.allandroidprojects.getirsample:id/layout_action1" must react ... passed in 0.080s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.classname: feature.DetailBugs.As a user I want to add a product to my wishlist and share a product by using detail wishlist and share buttons
testcase.name: I go to a product detail and click Wishlist and Share buttons, I should see this product in the my wishlist and Share button has a reaction -- @1.2
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario Outline: I go to a product detail and click Wishlist and Share buttons, I should see this product in the my wishlist and Share button has a reaction -- @1.2 Given I pass on boarding ... passed in 6.852s Given I am on home page ... passed in 58.061s When I open a product detail from a random category ... passed in 2.577s When I click the button by "com.allandroidprojects.getirsample:id/layout_action3" ... passed in 1.233s Then The "com.allandroidprojects.getirsample:id/layout_action3" must react ... passed in 0.092s
